content:
SDG Target 7.1: 7.1.1 Proportion of population with access to electricity; During this monitoring period, no new localities have been electrified/connected to the grid as confirmed from ESMP activity report /27/..

SDG Target 7.2: During the current monitoring period, the project activity generated 1,509,806 MWh of net renewable energy, which displaced part of the electricity otherwise supplied by grid connected fossil fuel fired power plants. Verification team has checked the calculation from the monitoring report /1.2/ and the ER calculation sheet /2.2/ and found correct.

SDG Target 13.0: The project, in the current reporting period has resulted in emission reduction of 912,224 tCOze. Verification team has checked the calculation from the monitoring report /1.2/ and the ER calculation sheet /2.2/ and found correct.

The emission reduction achieved during the current monitoring period i.e., from O1-July-2022 to 30-June-2023 is 29% higher than the ex-ante estimation for the same period, i.e. 706,914 tCO2e.

This is due to (i) equipments availability (thanks to good maintenance), (ii) increasing power demand from the grid, and (iii) upstream water releases from Buyo dam (due to in-operational group) /26/. Further Hydro generation is unexpected i.e. based on the water availability and not in the control of PP.
